item.description:
Flemings Prime Steakhouse and Wine Bar is hosting Covenant to Care for Children at one of the last Wednesday night event of the year. Come to Blue Back Square and for a $10.00 donation at the table in front of Flemings you will be eligible for 1/2 price items at Flemings, and discounts on drinks and food at all the other restaurants in Blue Back Square. There is live music, fun activities for the family and lost of delicious food and drink.

A group of us attend a Tastes and Toasts night a month ago and had a ball!

Please spread the word about this event and please join in the fun and bring your friends and family. You can stay at Fleming's for your entire meal or have a mobile feast moving from one food venue to the next.

To learn more visit www.covenanttocare.org

JUST FOR COOKING CLUB MEMBERS
I am going to see if I can get us a tete-a-tete with the Fleming's chef or sommelier. Look for an email telling you if I have pulled this off and what time it will occur.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one that looks like me.
item.name: Blue Back Square Tastes N' Toasts
